response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value to you, estimated at $15,000. Considering its quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this opportunity is too good to pass up, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 14500}
